flawed_nl_solution:
There were 30*0.2=<<30*0.2=6>>6 people who didn't show up
So 30-6=<<30-6=28>>28 people showed up
Of the people who showed up, 28*0.75=<<28*0.75=21>>21 got steak
So 28-21=<<28-21=7>>7 got chicken
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
